description: Get expert network hardening in {{city_upper}}. We lock down home Wi-Fi, block tracking, and isolate smart devices using open-source, local-first security tools. No subscriptions. No spyware. Just control.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Smart speakers, TVs, and even light bulbs often report back to third parties, collecting data about your home and usage patterns. Many of them bypass basic router settings completely.
Most home networks are wide open to malware, ad tracking, and insecure devices. Default settings leave you vulnerable to attacks that can compromise your privacy and security.
By default, most home routers send every website you visit through your ISP's DNS servers, allowing them to log and potentially sell your data.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We secure your home network using techniques trusted in professional environments. Our service protects against common threats like tracking, telemetry, and device exploitation while keeping you in full control of your network.

We isolate insecure smart devices, apply strict DNS filtering, and lock down access points to reduce risk. These changes are implemented with privacy in mind and without relying on subscription software or vendor lock-in.

Our approach is built on tested frameworks and practical tools, tailored to your space and your goals. Whether you're concerned about surveillance, reliability, or both, we deliver a hardened, private, and dependable network setup.

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We begin by evaluating your network layout, connected devices, and potential vulnerabilities.
From there, we apply hardening techniques using local-first, open-source tools that prioritize transparency and long-term control.
We explain each change so you are never left guessing. No subscriptions. No cloud dashboards. Just solid security that works.
